title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, to preserve the western view from the Phirozshah Mehta Garden on Malabar Hill, two funnels of visions have been marked on the land use(Development)plan of “D’’ Ward
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, to preserve the western view from the Phirozshah Mehta Garden on Malabar Hill, two funnels of visions have been marked on the land use(Development)plan of “D’’ Ward. No development will be permitted in the inner funnel of vision, and
